name: Diamond Sponsor

events_activities: USIC will host 3 events at your business [resulting in approx 120-280 visitors to your business]
DIAMOND EXCLUSIVE! One of these events will be advertised on the University Students' Union website with your business named in the title.

events_activities.description: Shout-outs at our biggest events of the year - minimum of 100 people each time!
details: Annual Dinner
Chaplaincy Dinner [hosted by the University of Sheffield's BNBR]
Two educational workshops

events_activities: DIAMOND EXCLUSIVE! Full-page advertisement in USIC's Freshers Guide which are distributed to over 200 students, and will be available online as a PDF
DIAMOND EXCLUSIVE! To be the only sponsor who's logo is featured on the noticeboard at the Fresher's AND Refresher's stall for everyone to see!
Distribution of your business leaflets at the Freshers AND Refreshers Fair
Your business logo added to the USIC Wall Calendar distributed to over 100 people at the Freshers Fair
DIAMOND EXCLUSIVE! Your business logo placed on the front of USIC's football shirts which are to be displayed at the University's Campus League competitions

social_media_marketing.description: Your logo on the promotional posters for events hosted solely by USIC
details: During Freshers, Charity and Discover Islam Week
All welfare and sporting events
BONUS! And the 3 weekly Islamic Circles

social_media_marketing.description: Shout-outs on Instagram and Facebook - this includes:
details: A stand-alone post dedicated to your business
Additionally USIC will produce a reel that will be personalised to your business - to be posted on Instagram, TikTok and Youtube Shorts
Subsequently 6 shout-outs across stories and the final post in a carousel
Your business featured on our Instagram Highlights

social_media_marketing.description: Shout-outs on USIC's WhatsApp Announcements chat - this includes:
details: An entire message dedicated to promoting your business
Subsequently, a shout-out within the announcement of 4 of our events

social_media_marketing.description: BONUS! Promotion on our Twitter with a minimum of 2 shout-outs
details: DIAMOND EXCLUSIVE! Your logo featured on the USIC Twitter banner so it is first thing people see on our page

digital_marketing.description: Your business featured on the USIC website - this includes
details: Logo to be featured on of our homepage alongside Gold sponsors
BONUS! A prominent feature with additional information and images
Your business highlighted on USIC Maps
A hyperlink to your business site to the footer of the website

digital_marketing.description: Your business advertised on USIC's weekly newsletter - 4 times a year!
details: At least 2 promotions which will take the full width of the text space
BONUS! To include a hyperlink to your website's site in the footer

digital_marketing: A shout-out to your business in 2 episodes of the USIC podcast
BONUS! An entire video advertising your business posted on YouTube and promoted on Instagram
Your business mentioned in all descriptions for YouTube videos posted this year thereby increasing your business's web presence and searchability

disclaimer_note: Whilst our 'DIAMOND EXCLUSIVE' and 'BONUS' benefits are only offered in the Diamond Package, other organisations may receive the BONUS features through other collaborations - however the 'DIAMOND EXCLUSIVE' benefits are ONLY reserved for the Diamond sponsor!

events_activities: USIC will host 2 events at your business
Your business logo displayed on the arm of USIC's football shirts
Your business logo added to the USIC Wall Calendar
Distribution of your business leaflets at the Freshers AND Refreshers Fair
Half-a-page advertisement in USIC's Freshers Guide

details: Chaplaincy Dinner [hosted by the University of Sheffield's BNBR]
An educational workshop

details: During Freshers and Discover Islam Week
All welfare and sporting events

4 shout-outs across stories and the final slide in a carousel post

Subsequently, a shout-out within the announcement of 2 of our events

Your business highlighted on USIC Maps

name: Silver Sponsor

events_activities: USIC will host 1 event at your business
Distribution of your business leaflets at the Freshers AND Refreshers Fair
Your logo featured in USIC's Freshers Guide
Shout-outs at USIC events to reach at least 150 people in totall
social_media_marketing: Your logo on promotional posters for a variety of USIC events (Including but not Limited to welfare, sports, education, volunteering) - a minimum of 12 posters

social_media_marketing.description: Shout-outs on Instagram and Facebook - this includes:
details: 2 shout-outs across stories and the final slide in a carousel post
Your business featured on our Instagram Highlights

social_media_marketing.description: Shoutouts on USIC's WhatsApp Announcements chat - this includes:
details: An entire message dedicated to promoting your business alongside the other Silver sponsors
A shout-out within the announcement of 2 of our events dedicated solely for your business

digital_marketing.description: Your business featured on the USIC website - this includes
details: Your business highlighted on USIC Maps
A hyperlink to your business site to the footer of the website

digital_marketing: Your logo displayed on USIC's weekly newsletter - at least 3 times a year
Your business mentioned in all descriptions for YouTube videos posted this year thereby increasing your business's web presence and searchability

disclaimer_note: Please note that all figures are based on previous event numbers and experiences, demonstrating the potential exposure and benefits your business can receive
